name: Birds (SOS Software)
overview: Birds is a simplified clone of the arcade classic Joust for the Atari 8-bit computers. It was developed by SOS Software and published by Robtek Ltd. in the UK for their King Size Compilation pack. The game was written in 1984, however it was not released officially until 1986. Birds also has the distinction of being the first game on side a of the first cassette of the compilation pack.
